characters: Multiple pedestrians and cyclists observed. A child in a blue jacket on the right side of the road, a pedestrian in a blue jacket with a backpack on the left side of the road, a man in a yellow jacket on the left side of the road, and a pedestrian crossing the road in front of a building.
summary: The video sequence shows several instances of 'ghost probing' behavior. In the first sequence, a child suddenly appears from the right side of the road, emerging from behind a parked vehicle. In the second sequence, a pedestrian with a backpack suddenly appears from the left side of the road, emerging from behind a parked vehicle. In the third sequence, a man in a yellow jacket suddenly appears from the left side of the road, emerging from behind a parked vehicle. In the fourth sequence, a pedestrian crosses the road in front of a building, emerging from behind a physical obstruction.
actions: The observer vehicle encounters multiple instances of pedestrians and cyclists suddenly emerging from behind obstructions, creating immediate collision risks.
key_objects: Parked vehicles on both sides of the road, pedestrians, cyclists, and a building at an intersection.
